summary: So I'm really into the Descendants movies, and they're making a third one! So I decided to combine my two favorite things, BTS...
body:
So I’m really into the Descendants movies, and they’re making a third one! So I decided to combine my two favorite things, BTS and Descendants and this happened!

Tae- Son Of Maleficent

“Call me a schemer call me a freak, how can you say that, I’m just, unique”

Jin- Son Of The Evil Queen

“I like to think I’m the fairest of them all…”

Namjoon- Son Of Jafar

“It’s called stealing, it’s like buying whatever I want, except its free”

Jungkook- Son Of Cruella De Vil

“Yeah, let’s just say we don’t get a lot of belly rubs”

Jimin- Son of The Queen Of Hearts

“I’m a rule breaker and a heartbreaker, just like my mom”

Suga- Son Of Hades

“I have a three headed dog for a pet…you really don’t want to mess with me”

Hoseok- Son Of Captain Hook

“Don’t scare you? But that’s my specialty”

body:
Good morning beautiful people

What a day to wake up to: JUNGKOOK HAS ACKNOWLEDGED HIS STATUS AS HYUNG. That just made my heart uwu uwu. ☺ I bet he really enjoyed tweeting that.

Jimin’s bucket hat looks so freaking adorable, I wonder what style or hair color he had this time?

summary: BTS Accidentally texts you revealing they like you. 💓📱
body:
BTS Accidentally texts you revealing they like you. 💓📱

Pretends it was a joke: Yoongi

Cries: Jimin + Hoseok

Almost has a full blown heart attack: Taehyung

Carries on, admitting feelings openly: Jin + Namjoon

Sends over a dozen memes in hopes you won’t scroll up and see his text: Jungkook

summary: BTS- Child Pulls Down Someone’s Pants
title: BTS- Child Pulls Down Someone’s Pants
body:
Got this request from @requestfairy like…last year, but I finally got to it! I’m trying to do two reactions a week. So far so good!

Jin

He was at the store during his off time and his son was right by his side. The little boy was making noises the whole time until his father got too invested in what type of oatmeal would be better for a sensitive stomach. Then he asked, “What do you think, Chicken?” which was his name for his son. He looked around and saw him talking to a teen dressed in loose pants and a gold chain.

Then he lost his balance and held on to the closest thing he could reach, the stranger’s pants. It was a silent standoff. He looked from his kid to the hop-hop youth. Then to his exposed panties. A moment later, Jin picked up his little chick and apologized profusely on behalf of his son. The guy said it was an accident, but that didn’t stop Jin from putting his child into the basket and zooming off to the next aisle.

Yoongi

Was a day off really a day off when you had twins? For Yoongi, the answer was yes, no matter how mischievous they were. He took the two to the park and told them to stay out of trouble as he went down the street to get some picnic foods for the three of them. With their cute angelic faces, they said, “Okay, appa!” and off the man went. He got some banana milk and fruit bowls for the kids, and for himself, a soda and a sandwich. Also, if they were good, they’d get half a chocolate bar each.

When Yoongi got back to the park, his kids quickly ran behind him screaming. A Man furiously holding up his pants began to berate the kids and ask if he was the father. He talked about how he was helping his daughter on one of the poles to slide down then the two pulled down his pants without warning. Yoongi used his pinky to dig out his ear, “You should’t have made your pants so easy to pull down. Let’s go have lunch, kids!”

Hoseok

No one was more excited than Papa Hobi to have his 4 year old child come to practice. She had just learned to walk on her own and was going to take dance practice starting next year. That was the plan at least. For now, she joined her dad and six uncles. She loved to hide and surprise her uncles. Jin always said she was lucky she was cute and tickled her. Her high pitched squeals were music to his ears.

After she was set down for a nap, the men practiced a new dance one more time before doing it once on camera. Everyone was focusing on themselves in the mirror and the music as this run through was being recorded. This meant no one noticed the little girl creeping up behind Uncle Kookie and pulling down his gym shorts. Everyone was wearing them for a uniformed look since it was being recorded. Why did it have to be him? All of her uncles burst out laughing and JHope apologized to the youngest but was laughing too hard to tell his child to apologize.

“Don’t–pfft–do that again, ok?”

Namjoon (RM)

His 10 year old was going through a Bad Boy phase. Maybe he should’ve spent more time with him instead of letting him watch all those old Greaser movies. The young boy wouldn’t be seen without his leather jacket, even in school. His closet was full of white shirts and different light wash jeans. Namjoon was taking care of him when he got called in for work. He took the 10 year old with him.

As Papa Joon worked in the studio, his oldest manager took care of his kid. The kid didn’t like how arrogant and strict he was so he waited for him to fall asleep before tying his shoes together and pantsing him within the span of thirty seconds. “Get back here you brat!” Namjoon gave his kid a stern look and set his jaw. With a raise of his brow, the kid was on the floor apologizing to the manager. “No leather jacket for a week.”

The kid started to cry as Namjoon apologized for his kid and took his child home. He hated when his dad got mad at him because it meant he went too far. Namjoon didn’t get mad often, so when he did it was a big deal.

Jimin

Jimin’s triplets ran away from him. He was playing the kissing monster, and chased his kids around the house. People warned him that if he gave his kids too much affection they wouldn’t take him seriously once they grew up. Jimin didn’t want any help other than from the person he married in raising the kids. They had some time before Uncle Yoongi showed up.

“Bora, Sora…now where is…” Jimin’s demeanor changed when he heard his only son squealing with laughter. Uncle Yoongi was here.

As he went into the hall to greet his hyung, he saw him trying to pull his pants back up. Raon was laughing as he grabbed onto Yoongi’s back. “Looking for someone?” The older asked and Jimin told him to get off of his hyung…only after taking a picture for Instagram.

Taehyung (V)

Now we all know he’s amazing with kids. All of his children were Daddy’s kids. They loved being with him and would listen to him more than their other parent. He told them to listen to the other, but that was easier said than done. Lately, one of the middle children (called 기린 because she was tall for her age) have had a fixation with pockets and was always reaching into them, even ones belonging to strangers. Tae had a lot of apologizing to do.

Today’s was the biggest apology he’s ever had to do. Since his betrothed was busy all of a sudden, they dropped the kids off at the studio where V was shooting his newest drama series. Everyone was so well behaved and loved their actor noonas, hyungs, oppas, and unnies. Suddenly 기린 was nowhere to be found. Then the director screamed, but it wasn’t cut. Her pants were on the ground and 기린 was going through her pockets. V quickly picked up his child as everyone else looked away. He got on the floor to bow and made his tall girl do the same.

Jungkook

Being a working single dad was hard for Kookie, but seeing the face of his little Byungwoo made everything better. He was very responsible and cared for his dad a lot. Jungkook had put him to nap a while ago, so he could get some practice done in the living room. Jimin and V came over to practice with him. During a break, Byungwoo gave his dad and uncles water bottles from the fridge.

“That reminds me, I have a treat for you, but it’s in my back pocket.” V teased. Byung-ie then chased his uncle around the house trying to get whatever treat was hidden in his back pocket. The 7 year old then began to pout and gave up for a bit. Well, everyone thought he had given up until Tae’s shorts were pulled to the ground by the little boy in order to reach what turned out to be a chocolate bonbon. Jungkook apologized, but V said it was ok. He really was Kookie’s kid.

The little boy was making noises the whole time until his father got too invested in what type of oatmeal would be better for a sensitive stomach. Then he asked, “What do you think, Chicken?” which was his name for his son. He looked around and saw him talking to a teen dressed in loose pants and a gold chain.

Then he lost his balance and held on to the closest thing he could reach, the stranger’s pants. It was a silent standoff. He looked from his kid to the hop-hop youth. Then to his exposed panties. A moment later, Jin picked up his little chick and apologized profusely on behalf of his son. The guy said it was an accident, but that didn’t stop Jin from putting his child into the basket and zooming off to the next aisle.

Yoongi

Was a day off really a day off when you had twins? For Yoongi, the answer was yes, no matter how mischievous they were. He took the two to the park and told them to stay out of trouble as he went down the street to get some picnic foods for the three of them. With their cute angelic faces, they said, “Okay, appa!” and off the man went. He got some banana milk and fruit bowls for the kids, and for himself, a soda and a sandwich. Also, if they were good, they’d get half a chocolate bar each.

When Yoongi got back to the park, his kids quickly ran behind him screaming. A Man furiously holding up his pants began to berate the kids and ask if he was the father. He talked about how he was helping his daughter on one of the poles to slide down then the two pulled down his pants without warning. Yoongi used his pinky to dig out his ear, “You should’t have made your pants so easy to pull down. Let’s go have lunch, kids!”

[[MORE]]

Hoseok

No one was more excited than Papa Hobi to have his 4 year old child come to practice. She had just learned to walk on her own and was going to take dance practice starting next year. That was the plan at least. For now, she joined her dad and six uncles. She loved to hide and surprise her uncles. Jin always said she was lucky she was cute and tickled her. Her high pitched squeals were music to his ears.

After she was set down for a nap, the men practiced a new dance one more time before doing it once on camera. Everyone was focusing on themselves in the mirror and the music as this run through was being recorded. This meant no one noticed the little girl creeping up behind Uncle Kookie and pulling down his gym shorts. Everyone was wearing them for a uniformed look since it was being recorded. Why did it have to be him? All of her uncles burst out laughing and JHope apologized to the youngest but was laughing too hard to tell his child to apologize.

“Don’t–pfft–do that again, ok?”

Namjoon (RM)

His 10 year old was going through a Bad Boy phase. Maybe he should’ve spent more time with him instead of letting him watch all those old Greaser movies. The young boy wouldn’t be seen without his leather jacket, even in school. His closet was full of white shirts and different light wash jeans. Namjoon was taking care of him when he got called in for work. He took the 10 year old with him.

As Papa Joon worked in the studio, his oldest manager took care of his kid. The kid didn’t like how arrogant and strict he was so he waited for him to fall asleep before tying his shoes together and pantsing him within the span of thirty seconds. “Get back here you brat!” Namjoon gave his kid a stern look and set his jaw. With a raise of his brow, the kid was on the floor apologizing to the manager. “No leather jacket for a week.”

The kid started to cry as Namjoon apologized for his kid and took his child home. He hated when his dad got mad at him because it meant he went too far. Namjoon didn’t get mad often, so when he did it was a big deal.

Jimin

Jimin’s triplets ran away from him. He was playing the kissing monster, and chased his kids around the house. People warned him that if he gave his kids too much affection they wouldn’t take him seriously once they grew up. Jimin didn’t want any help other than from the person he married in raising the kids. They had some time before Uncle Yoongi showed up.

“Bora, Sora…now where is…” Jimin’s demeanor changed when he heard his only son squealing with laughter. Uncle Yoongi was here.

As he went into the hall to greet his hyung, he saw him trying to pull his pants back up. Raon was laughing as he grabbed onto Yoongi’s back. “Looking for someone?” The older asked and Jimin told him to get off of his hyung…only after taking a picture for Instagram.

Taehyung (V)

Now we all know he’s amazing with kids. All of his children were Daddy’s kids. They loved being with him and would listen to him more than their other parent. He told them to listen to the other, but that was easier said than done. Lately, one of the middle children (called 기린 because she was tall for her age) have had a fixation with pockets and was always reaching into them, even ones belonging to strangers. Tae had a lot of apologizing to do.

Today’s was the biggest apology he’s ever had to do. Since his betrothed was busy all of a sudden, they dropped the kids off at the studio where V was shooting his newest drama series. Everyone was so well behaved and loved their actor noonas, hyungs, oppas, and unnies. Suddenly 기린 was nowhere to be found. Then the director screamed, but it wasn’t cut. Her pants were on the ground and 기린 was going through her pockets. V quickly picked up his child as everyone else looked away. He got on the floor to bow and made his tall girl do the same.

Jungkook

Being a working single dad was hard for Kookie, but seeing the face of his little Byungwoo made everything better. He was very responsible and cared for his dad a lot. Jungkook had put him to nap a while ago, so he could get some practice done in the living room. Jimin and V came over to practice with him. During a break, Byungwoo gave his dad and uncles water bottles from the fridge.

“That reminds me, I have a treat for you, but it’s in my back pocket.” V teased. Byung-ie then chased his uncle around the house trying to get whatever treat was hidden in his back pocket. The 7 year old then began to pout and gave up for a bit. Well, everyone thought he had given up until Tae’s shorts were pulled to the ground by the little boy in order to reach what turned out to be a chocolate bonbon. Jungkook apologized, but V said it was ok. He really was Kookie’s kid.
trail.content:
Got this request from @requestfairy like…last year, but I finally got to it! I’m trying to do two reactions a week. So far so good!

caption:
Mini Kookie 🌸

So Jungkook’s was tied most of the time! Chibiusa pulled ahead by just a single vote! I’m glad too. As I was reading up on the character, I was surprised it wasn’t a unanimus choice.

blog.description: 107% BTS blog that will make you smile. Your holy grail for anything BTS related: #BTS news #BTS gif #BTS link #Funny memes & videos #cute posts, and so on. Find the members of BTS: RM JIN SUGA JHOPE JIMIN V JUNGKOOK Follow Mimi, a friendly ghost who is here to share smiles and help you ^^. -The crediting is added to the caption or the source-

title: JIN MEETING BIGHIT:
body:
Jin: So this year I was thinking of many things
BIGHIT: *whispers* Oh no
Jin: I even brought with me all the arguments alongside kitchen scissors if you insist on not giving my demands the rights they deserve.
BIGHIT: Just tell us what do you want? A bigger apartment? More lobster on tour?  
Jin: A concert for BTS & LEE HYUN & TXT
BIGHIT: Your schedule is full and TXT just debuted and-
Jin: Hmm.. *Grabs the kitchen scissors*
BIGHIT: OK A BIG CONCERT! THE BEST CONCERT! AN EXTRAORDINARY CONCERT! WE SHALL EXECUTE JIN CEO.
